metadata.title: CVE-2019-14818 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in all dpdk version 17.x.x before 17.11.8, 16.x.x before 16.11.10, 18.x.x before 18.11.4 and 19.x.x before 19.08.1 where a malicious master, or a container with access to vhost_user socket, can send specially crafted VRING_SET_NUM messages, resulting in a memory leak including file descriptors. This flaw could lead to a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: dpdk package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.11.4-1').
